data.caption: Clarification sought from National Aluminium Company Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from National Aluminium Company Ltd on January 27 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://energy.economictimes.indiatimes.com dated January 27 2026 quoting "Nalco eyes 200-300 MW green power capacity backed by battery storage for low-carbon aluminium"

The reply is awaited.
